content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://covidgentwo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse-analytics-ws/nyc_taxi_data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', -- Default is ',' just specified for knowledge
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
